burgers.name: Classic Burger
burgers.description: A juicy beef patty topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles, served on a sesame seed bun.

burgers.name: Cheeseburger
burgers.description: A classic burger with an added slice of American cheese.

burgers.name: Bacon Burger
burgers.description: A delicious burger topped with crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo.

burgers.name: Avocado Turkey Burger
burgers.description: A healthier option with a turkey patty, sliced avocado, lettuce, and honey mustard.

burgers.name: Veggie Burger
burgers.description: A plant-based patty made with a blend of vegetables, served with lettuce, tomato, and vegan mayo.

burgers.name: Double Cheeseburger
burgers.description: A burger lover's dream with two beef patties and two slices of American cheese.

burgers.name: Hawaiian Burger
burgers.description: A tropical twist with a beef patty, grilled pineapple, ham, Swiss cheese, and teriyaki sauce.

burgers.name: Spicy Jalapeno Burger
burgers.description: A fiery burger with jalapeno slices, pepper jack cheese, lettuce, and chipotle mayo.
